column2: you place your name on a list to be seated either inside or outside (you choose). Really small establishment
column3: with a home like feel. Food is really good and affordable. Water is already on the table. I liked not having to wait for it to be served
column4: but not the fact of not having any ice in the glass. The restroom is small (for one person) and is fairly clean
column5: but could use an automatic air freshener. Staff is friendly. I would definitely go back.
